# Breath holds

Breath holds are important for watersport athletes, especially when surfing large waves.


# Postural restoration institute (PRI)

- Inverted breathing
- Crocodile breathing (prone)
- Fetal breathing
- Sidelying breathing over wedge


## Objective measures

- Swimming the length of a pool without surfacing
- Breath holds for time
